summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 59W, Page 146 of the Official Land Use Map on the west side of Courtland Place South between South Andover and South Dakota Streets from Residental, Single-family 5000 (SF5000) to Neighborhood Commercial 1, 30 foot height limit (NC-1, 30') Zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Rainier/Genesee Business District Plan; C.F. 295247.)
